issue.title: [CF 846] Cooldowns/Conditions for tinkers
issue.body:
I'm trying to build icon to show the cooldown of frag belt. But only if I'm actually using that tinker. When I'm using Nitro boost I want to show another icon at a different location. Do you think it'd be possible to check which tinker I'm using in an icon condition?


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #846 | Raw

comments.body:
Use GetItemSpell(). Something like this in a Lua condition (the spell name in quotes is case sensitive)

``` GetItemSpell(GetInventoryItemLink("player", 6)) == "Whatever The Spell Is Named" ```

To figure out what the spell is named, do this slash command (you only care about the first value it gives. It might give a rank as the second value, but that doesn't matter):

/dump GetItemSpell(GetInventoryItemLink("player", 6))

This is the code that will let you check your currently equipped belt. Use the itemID or the "Item name" instead of this in the condition to check things regardless of where they are.

``` GetInventoryItemLink("player", 6) ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Working as intended, thanks. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer
